You can still expect your Grand & Toy items to show up on time and when you need them most. *Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
